alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Wright and central Sherburne Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Becker, or 14 miles north of Buffalo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Becker around 355 PM CDT. Monticello around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Big Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 178 and 196. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 189 and 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
